headline: 1 Bargain Stock That I'm Buying Like There's No Tomorrow
summary: The stock market drawdown has opened up several investment opportunities, but few are more attractive than The Trade Desk (NASDAQ: TTD) right now.  The Trade Desk's growth runway is massive, and if you don't buy shares of this top-tier company, you'll regret it years down the road.  The Trade Desk has been a rock-solid performer for its entire life on the public markets.
